name: Dark theme for Gosu Chat
description: A dark theme for Gosu chat, very easy to edit. I will be updating it constantly and improving its functionality.

user.name: Vednoc
user.about: Hi! I am Vednoc, but people mostly call me Mew. Making website themes is one of the things that I absolutely love doing, so I decided to share them with the world.

additional_info:
To change the colors just edit the global variable. You can also use already made white theme, but it's still in experimental stage. I will add a way to change colors directly from Userstyles's color picker.

Header and sidebars now react to hover. You will have to hover over it for a little while in order to fully extend the element's height/width. 

If you want to enable 'gaps' like shown in the image, just navigate to the bottom and delete the two things I mentioned.
